meanings.definition: To touch or stroke gently in a loving or soothing manner.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys caressing her cat's fur.
meanings.sent2: The mother was caressing her baby's cheek.
meanings.sent3: The puppy showed its love by caressing its owner's hand.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze caressing the leaves whispered a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: His fingers caressing the piano keys created a beautiful melody.

meanings.definition: Expressing love or affection through gentle touch.
meanings.sent1: The caressing hug made her feel loved.
meanings.sent2: He had a caressing tone in his voice when he spoke to her.
meanings.sent3: The caressing gesture of holding hands warmed their hearts.
meanings.sent4: The caressing sunlight bathed the room in a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: Her caressing smile brightened up the whole room.

meanings.definition: The act of showing affection through gentle touch.
meanings.sent1: His caressing of her hand was a sign of his love.
meanings.sent2: The cat's purring was a form of caressing.
meanings.sent3: The gentle caressing of the waves on the shore was calming.
meanings.sent4: The painting captured the essence of caressing in its brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: The caressing of the wind on her face felt like a gentle kiss.
